alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:14PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central and southern Spokane County through 1045 PM PDT... At 913 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheney, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spokane, Spokane Valley, Cheney, Airway Heights, Medical Lake, Fairwood, Country Homes, Town And Country, Fairchild AFB, Dishman, Four Lakes, Marshall, Tyler, Valleyford, Mica and Opportunity. This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 256 and 287. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
